text: Since the original Friday the 13th film in 1980 there has been a myriad of media releases from the franchise, ranging from films, novels, comics, albums and a television series. == Films == ==Featurettes== ==Shorts== == TV series == == Novels == == Video games == == Comics == == Albums == == References == Friday the 13th Category:Friday the 13th (franchise) lists
title: List of Friday the 13th media
